roleset.name: to stop, slow up or control
roleset.note: REIN_IN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rein' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from rein.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: If he were able [*-1] to construct a popular and efficient corporatist system , [he or his heir]-2 would be wellplaced [*-2] to rein in political opposition , and to re-establish control in Eastern Europe .
